    • Method Detail

      • renderTauPlot

        public static BufferedImage renderTauPlot(double[] x,
                                          double[] y,
                                          CalculateTau.CalculateTauResult result,
                                          boolean fitFailed,
                                          int width,
                                          int height)
        Renders a Tau plot with given data points, fit curve, axes, labels, and annotations.
        Parameters:
        x - the array of x-coordinate values for the data points to be plotted
        y - the array of y-coordinate values for the data points to be plotted
        result - the calculated result containing the Tau value and R² value for the exponential fit
        fitFailed - a flag indicating whether the exponential fit failed
        width - the width of the generated image in pixels
        height - the height of the generated image in pixels
        Returns:
        a BufferedImage representing the rendered Tau plot

      • exportExperimentHistogramsToPdf

        public static void exportExperimentHistogramsToPdf(Experiment experiment,
                                                   Path outputFile)
                                            throws IOException
        Exports histograms of the experimental data to a PDF file. Each recording of the experiment is represented as a histogram in a separate page within the generated PDF.
        Parameters:
        experiment - The experiment containing recordings with track count data to be exported.
        outputFile - The output Path where the generated PDF file will be saved.
        Throws:
        IOException - If an error occurs during the creation or saving of the PDF file.

      • exportExperimentHistogramsToPngs

        public static void exportExperimentHistogramsToPngs(Experiment experiment,
                                                    Path experimentPath)
                                             throws IOException
        Exports histograms of the experimental data as individual PNG images. Each recording is rendered to a separate file under: Output/Background Plots/.png
        Parameters:
        experiment - The experiment containing recordings with track count data.
        experimentPath - The root directory of the experiment (used to resolve Output path).
        Throws:
        IOException - If any image cannot be written.

      • saveTauFitPlot

        public static void saveTauFitPlot(List<Track> tracks,
                                  CalculateTau.CalculateTauResult tauResult,
                                  Path experimentPath,
                                  String recordingName,
                                  int squareIndex)
        Saves a plot visualizing the Tau-fit result for a square as a PNG file under “Success” or “Failed”, within the current experiment’s output directory.
        Parameters:
        tracks - the list of tracks used to compute the frequency distribution (their durations will form the x-axis)
        tauResult - the result of the Tau calculation (may indicate failure)
        experimentPath - the base path of the experiment directory
        recordingName - the name of the recording
        squareIndex - the index of the square region (used to name the file)
